name: @bagubagu/lambda-cfn-hosted-zone
description: Cloudformation custom resource to get hosted zone id

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production --no-package-lock
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run package && sam deploy --template-file packaged.yml --stack-name cfn-hosted-zone --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && npm run clean

author: PT Bagubagu Solusi Indonesia
